document_data.name: Uggie
document_data.mainbody:
'''Uggie''' was a pet [[otyugh]] belonging to the adventuring group called the [[Fallbacks]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{Quote|Uggie loved all her people, especially her [[Tess]] person and her [[Anson]] person. They were the first friends she'd ever had, and they'd given her a name. Anson had insisted she needed one, and so Tess had given her one. She was Uggie now, and she quite liked her name.|Uggie's thoughts.<ref>}}
